targetLength.infoHint: The generator will try to keep resulting word length within this boundary, but no guarantee is made.

seed.label: Randomization Seed
seed.infoHint: This can be any arbitrary chain of numbers and letters, which the generator will use for its randomization. Defining a seed is useful when you want reproducible results.

sequencingStrategy.label: Sequencing strategy
sequencingStrategy.infoHint: A sequencing strategy determines how the samples will be cut up into smaller chunks which the generator can then use to generate new words.

spellingStrategy.label: Spelling strategy
spellingStrategy.infoHint: A spelling strategy is applied to generated words, for example to capitalize their first letter.

entropy.label: Entropy
entropy.infoHint: A number between 0 and 1 (inclusive), which determines the randomness of words, in general. Increasing this number also increases variance, but at the cost of cohesion.

start.label: Entropy start
start.infoHint: A number between 0 and 1 (inclusive), which determines the randomness of starting sequences. Increasing this number also increases variance, but at the cost of cohesion.

middle.label: Entropy middle
middle.infoHint: A number between 0 and 1 (inclusive), which determines the randomness of middle sequences. Increasing this number also increases variance, but at the cost of cohesion.

end.label: Entropy end
end.infoHint: A number between 0 and 1 (inclusive), which determines the randomness of ending sequences. Increasing this number also increases variance, but at the cost of cohesion.

endingPickMode.label: Ending pick mode
endingPickMode.infoHint: Determines how and if an ending sequence will be picked for generated words. NONE: Ending sequences are not considered at all and may even appear in the middle of a built word. Greatest variance, lowest cohesion. RANDOM: An ending sequence is picked entirely at random, from the set of ending sequences. Good variance and cohesion. FOLLOW_BRANCH: Branches will be followed until eventually reaching an ending sequence, which is then picked. Lowest variance and greatest cohesion.

sampleSet.infoHint: The generator draws from its defined sample set. The more samples there are, the better the variety and cohesion of the results will be.
